data.title: For Them That Trespass
data.meta_description: An original very rare release "country of origin" UK 1 Sheet for the 1949 Alberto Cavalcanti English writer novelist drama - an odd story of a writer who lives in a slum to get first hand information for a new novel, and he witnesses a crime, and lets an innocent man be convicted for it because he doesn't want to revea
data.text:
An original very rare release "country of origin" UK 1 Sheet for the 1949 Alberto Cavalcanti English writer novelist drama - an odd story of a writer who lives in a slum to get first hand information for a new novel, and he witnesses a crime, and lets an innocent man be convicted for it because he doesn't want to reveal that he was living there!

Film Category: Drama

Actor / Actresses: Stephan Murray, Patricia Plunkett, Rosalyn Boulter, Michael Laurence, Joan Dowling, and Richard Todd (in his first role)

Poster Type: UK 1 Sheet 27 x 40
